StatDef.label: Armor - Magic
StatDef.description: Armor against magic damage like abilities threw magical attacks like aspectual magic.

StatDef.label: Armor - Elemental
StatDef.description: Armor against elemental damage like abilities threw elemental attacks like ice or fire magic.

StatDef.label: Armor - Holy
StatDef.description: Armor against holy damage like abilities threw holy attacks like light and healing magic.

StatDef.label: Armor - Water
StatDef.description: Armor against water or ice damage.

StatDef.label: Armor - Earth
StatDef.description: Armor against earth or nature damage.

StatDef.label: Armor - Wind
StatDef.description: Armor against wind or lightning damage.

StatDef.label: Armor - Light
StatDef.description: Armor against light damage like abilities threw light attacks.

StatDef.label: Armor - Dark
StatDef.description: Armor against dark damage like abilities threw dark attacks.

StatDef.label: magic damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from magic-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: elemental damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from elemental-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: holy damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from holy-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: water damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from water-ice-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: earth damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from earth-nature-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: wind damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from wind-lightning-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: light damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from light-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: dark damage
StatDef.description: A multiplier on damage from dark-type attacks for weapons made of this material.

StatDef.label: Armor - Magic
StatDef.description:
The protection given against magic damage like abilities threw magical attacks like aspectual magic. 

Upon taking damage, first this armor rating is reduced by the attack's armor penetration value. 

The remaining armor rating is then compared against a random number from 0 to 100. 

 - If the random number is under half the armor rating, the damage deflects harmlessly. 
 - If the random number is over half the armor rating, but not higher than the armor rating, the damage is reduced by half and changed to blunt. 
 - If the random number is greater than the armor rating, the armor has no effect. 

For example, at 90% armor rating against an attack with 10% armor penetration, there is a 40% chance of deflecting the attack harmlessly, and a 40% chance of mitigating the damage. 

Each layer of armor is applied separately, from the outside in.

StatDef.label: Armor - Elemental
StatDef.description:

Each layer of armor is applied separately, from the outside in.
